json
{
  "environments": {
    "development": {
      "host": "dev.example.com",
      "username": "developer",
      "remotePath": "/var/www/dev",
      "options": {
        "verbose": true,
        "dryRun": false
      }
    },
    "staging": {
      "host": "staging.example.com",
      "username": "deploy",
      "remotePath": "/var/www/staging",
      "options": {
        "backup": true,
        "checksum": "md5"
      }
    },
    "production": {
      "host": "prod.example.com",
      "username": "deploy",
      "remotePath": "/var/www/html",
      "options": {
        "backup": true,
        "checksum": "sha256",
        "requireConfirmation": true
      }
    }
  }
}

ğŸ”— é›†æˆç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

CI/CD é›†æˆ â€‹

GitHub Actions ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

yaml
name: Deploy to Production
on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v2
        with:
          node-version: '16'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
        
      - name: Build
        run: npm run build
        
      - name: Deploy with SCP Upload CLI
        run: |
          npx scp-upload-cli \
            --env production \
            --config .scp-config.json \
            --backup \
            --checksum sha256 \
            ./dist/
        env:
          SCP_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.DEPLOY_PASSWORD }}

FROM node:16-alpine

# å®‰è£… SCP Upload CLI
RUN npm install -g scp-upload-cli

# å¤åˆ¶é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶

WORKDIR /app

# è®¾ç½®å…¥å£ç‚¹
ENTRYPOINT ["./deploy.sh"]
